commit.message: Fixed review comments: textArea.requestFocusInWindow() is called only after the window is shown and robot.waitForIdle() is called, wait until focus is on textArea, caught UnsupportedLookAndFeelException and ignore LnF
Fixed review comments: frame created in EDT, waitForIdle() added after frame creation, editor access in EDT
Create a regression test for JDK-4514331
